name: @polyn/blueprint
description: An easy to use, flexible, and powerful validation library for nodejs and browsers

scripts.pre-push: npm run lint && npm test && node pre-push.js
scripts.test: node test.js -r nyan && node test-browser.js -r nyan && npm run test:ts
scripts.test:coverage:ci: mkdir ./coverage && touch ./coverage/lcov.info && node test-browser.js -r tap && npm run test:ts && nyc node test.js -r tap,summary && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov > ./coverage/lcov.info
scripts.test:coveralls: nyc node test.js && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls

author: Andy Wright <andes.collab@gmail.com> (https://github.com/losandes)
